content: slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet us single_crochet - single_crochet treble_crochet - treble us double_crochet - double_crochet dtr - treble_crochet us treble_crochet - treble how to make the stitches double_crochet - insert hook into top of stitch from previous row yarn over and pull through yarn over pull yarn through two loops on hook treble - yarn over insert hook into top of stitch from previous row or the centre circle or the space if making a granny square yarn over and pull through yarn over pull yarn through first two loops on hook yarn over pull yarn through remaining two loops on hook treble_crochet - yarn over twice insert hook into top of stitch from previous row yarn over and pull through yarn over pull yarn through first two stitches on hook yarn over and pull through next two stitches on hook yarn over and pull through final two stitches on hook please feel free to make give away or sell the stockings you make but please do not share or sell this pattern
